title: DID for verified Career Audit Trail
description: Keeping your CV, references and skills current is an ongoing, cumbersome effort. The facts are not checked or verified wasting time & money.
solution: Using your DID linked to your job references, skills as an online, standardised & verified CV makes it accessible to humans and machines.
experience:
Built various HR Tech & Data Driven products & companies.  
Can reuse these components to make Cardano / ADA relevant to the career jouirney.
